title: Research Topic: Russian Reverse Capture Infrastructure Mapping (2008-2016)
summary: Based on the research priority 'Russian Reverse Capture Infrastructure Mapping (2008-2016)', this event represents a significant development in the area described as: Document the systematic study and targeting of American institutional infrastructure using their own analytical frameworks... This event demonstrates the interconnected nature of global kleptocracy and corruption networks, involving multiple actors across jurisdictions and highlighting the need for coordinated international response.
